bug.author: myungjoo
bug.summary: [TAOS-CI Conf] Incorrect Build Configuration for GBS
bug.description:
Please add the standard Tizen:Unified build.conf to the gbs.conf from , and add it to the profile of gbs.conf. (ref: <denchmark-link:https://source.tizen.org/documentation/developer-guide/environment-setup>https://source.tizen.org/documentation/developer-guide/environment-setup</denchmark-link> ) Without this, gbs cannot use the following statement defined in the build conf: <denchmark-code>%if "%_repository" == "standard"
Prefer: mesa libgbm Substitute: mesa-libGLESv2 coregl Substitute: mesa-libEGL coregl
%define _with_rdp 1 Macros: %_with_rdp 1 :Macros
%endif </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1235>#1235</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
